branchCategory.name: Dryer Accessories
branchCategory.description: Optional accessories include: a separately installed power transformer (supplies other than standard power and voltage); dedicated base (integrates a separately installed power transformer and the air dryer); dust-protecting filter set (prevents a decline in the performance of an air dryer); bypass piping set (connecting this set to the air dryer allows a substantial reduction in installation time); foundations bolt set (fixes the air dryer to the foundations); and a piping adapter (converts the thread type of and IN/OUT fitting for an air dryer).

branchItem.name: IDF/IDU, Dust Protecting Filter Set
branchItem.description: <P>IDF refrigerated air dryer series, in compliance with the Montreal Protocol Regulations, uses refrigerants R134a and R407C to prevent any damage to the earth's ozone layer. (Medium size series use R22). Series IDF can accommodate an inlet temperature of 40°C. Corrosion resistance is improved by using a stainless steel, plate type heat exchanger. </P>

branchItem.name: IDF/IDU, Power Transformer, Separately Installed
branchItem.description: <P>IDF refrigerated air dryer series, in compliance with the Montreal Protocol Regulations, uses refrigerants R134a and R407C to prevent any damage to the earth's ozone layer. (Medium size series use R22). Series IDF can accommodate an inlet temperature of 40°C. Corrosion resistance is improved by using a stainless steel, plate type heat exchanger. </P>

branchItem.name: IDF/IDU, Dedicated Base for Separately Installed Power Transformer
branchItem.description: <P>IDF refrigerated air dryer series, in compliance with the Montreal Protocol Regulations, uses refrigerants R134a and R407C to prevent any damage to the earth's ozone layer. (Medium size series use R22). Series IDF can accommodate an inlet temperature of 40°C. Corrosion resistance is improved by using a stainless steel, plate type heat exchanger. </P>

branchItem.name: IDF/IDU, Bypass Piping Set
branchItem.description: <P>IDF refrigerated air dryer series, in compliance with the Montreal Protocol Regulations, uses refrigerants R134a and R407C to prevent any damage to the earth's ozone layer. (Medium size series use R22). Series IDF can accommodate an inlet temperature of 40°C. Corrosion resistance is improved by using a stainless steel, plate type heat exchanger. </P>

branchItem.name: IDF/IDU, Piping Adapter Set
branchItem.description: <p>Adapter for converting thread type of an IN/Out fitting for air dryers from Rc to NPT</p>
